name: phone_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool phone_and_email_validator_v2.
Tool description: Extremely Useful tool for Phone, Email, IP Address and Postal Code Validation
API description: Validates a given phone number using the Phone and Email Validator API from RapidAPI.

phone.description: The phone number to be validated in E164 format (e.g., '19542567890' for USA).
